actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend chapter 83 of title 5, United States Code, to authorize the retirement of employees after 30 years of service.

summary.text: Entitles Federal employees to civil service pensions after completing 30 years of service. Limits the amount of creditable military service for civil service retirement purposes to the greater of four years or all periods of military service performed during a war declared by Congress.

titles.title: A bill to amend chapter 83 of title 5, United States Code, to authorize the retirement of employees after 30 years of service.
